about_the_game:
This DLC uncensors all dialogue and scenes. In addition it adds a gallery to view CGs and movies at any time.
In downloading this DLC you are confirming you are 18 years of age or older (or your regional equivalent) and agree to seeing content of a sexual nature.

Instructions

1. Purchase the Game on Steam
2. Download -> Run -> close
3. Download the free DLC +18patch Mod.
4. Unpack the Mod, replace the folder data (root) and the folder pictures (resources\Graphics)
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Lovely Heroines\game
5. Start Lovely Heroines and enjoy the Full+18 version.

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains content of a sexual nature, including:
Sexual jokes, innuendo, and references
Full Frontal Nudity (Both Male and Female)

Contains scenes depicting sexual acts:
Vaginal Sex
Oral Sex

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64 bit)
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
